name: RHINO Renew 3OZ
description:
RHINO RENEW Tires-Rubber-Vinyl provides unsurpassed protection and gloss intensification that restores critical compounds of your tires, rubber, vinyl, trim, and dashboard. It’s the most durable and longest lasting gloss available. 

Creates an intense deep black gloss on tires and rubber, and renews rich luster, color, and textures to vinyl.
It penetrates, absorbing deep into rubber and vinyl; it nourishes 
and  transforms aged, dry, dull, and weathered tires, rubber, and vinyl to like new again; forms a supple, silky-smooth, and dry, anti-static finish that’s easier to keep show clean.
No messy greasy, oily sling-off, or gummy build-up.
Will not stain, discolor, build-up or wash off; it dries in minutes.
Protects against hazing, fading, brittleness, premature aging, cracking, oxidation, and off-gassing of vinyl onto windows.
Reduces and repels harmful brake dust and road film build-up.
Blocks UVR’s, ozone, oxidation, acid-rain, pollution, and Mother Nature, and it’s free from silicone, wax, oils, and caustic additives that can VOID tire warranties!

For Use On: e.g., smooth or textured rubber, vinyl, soft plastics, silicone, and other synthetics. Exterior: Tires, bumpers, trim, cowlings, car bras, and weather seals. Interior: Dashboard, seats, consoles, and trim. Engine Bay: Hoses, coated wiring, shrouds, tanks, and reservoirs. Suspension/Frame: Boots, bushings, mounts, guides, spacers, and more.

name: RHINO Gloss 3OZ
description:
RHINO GLOSS gives you an unmatched deep wet-glassy show-finish that stands up to the elements and months of  wear and tear. Stand out from the crowd with our enviable gloss.  

Lock in a “new car” shine in just minutes! 

Creates spectacular optical clarity, reflectivity, color, depth, and brilliance, beyond show-room new.
No messy powdery residue, silicone, wax, or abrasives. NO hard work. Dries immediately; it will not build-up, melt, splotch, or wash off. A little goes a long way!
Forms an invisible Micro- Armourä barrier for incredible scratch resistance against abrasions, scuffing, pitting, nicks, and chips.
Repels damaging grimy brake dust build-up on wheels, tires, and paint.
Unsurpassed repellency, and run-off effect. Fills, smoothes, and seals microscopic peaks and valleys, pores, and damage against harmful contaminants; forms an anti-static, super-slick, and easy to clean surface; reduces coefficient of friction and surface tension; and it blocks UVR’s, ozone, oxidation, acid-rain, pollution, and Mother Nature.
X-Treme temperature formula protects engine components, exhaust, and brake calipers.
A little goes a long way..apply with a microfiber towel.

For Use On: e.g., paint, clear-coats, powder-coats and carbon-fiber; wheels, chrome, aluminum, and all bare and treated metals; glass, fiber-glass, gel coats, trim, head and tail lamps; and engine, exhaust, brakes, suspension, and more.
